activities:
Asteres accesses and processes information provided by users of its ScriptCenter kiosks sold, rented, or provided on a trial basis to pharmacies and retail outlets for the purpose of providing automated delivery of prescriptions and over the counter retail items. 

As part of its ongoing support to service the kiosks used by the aforementioned customers, Asteres can and may need to access personal information to assist its customers to ensure the proper operation of its ScriptCenter units.

Asteres also operates websites for the marketing and operation of its ScriptCenter kiosks and can collect information to the extent described in its Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Drugs & Pharmaceuticals - (DRG)Computer & Peripherals - (CPT)Information Services - (INF)Packaging Eqpt (other than food) - (PKG)
personaldata: Company data; Consumer information data, including healthcare data, that is obtained through web interfaces, ScriptCenter kiosks, and pharmacy or retail store personnel. Information may be collected by phone from pharmacy or retail personnel for troubleshooting.
